biography: Ron Eltanal received his B.A. from Williams College and his M.F.A. from the University of Southern California. He has produced, written, directed, shot or edited award-winning films that have screened at numerous festivals and competitions, including Sundance, Cannes, Torino International, LA Shorts and the Student Academy and Emmy Awards. Additionally, he has directed a feature film and music videos, written feature screenplays, and co-founded a non-profit theatre company.  Recently, his short film "Nostalgic," starring Chicago film and theatre legend Mike Nussbaum, has screened or won awards at over 30 film festivals and competitions worldwide.  At DePaul, he has served as Chair of the Digital Cinema Program Committee since 2011.
